lead_paragraph: Heavy gunfire rang out in celebration in Kabul after Afghanistan's cricket team secured a last-gasp victory over Zimbabwe on Wednesday to win a one-day series in Sharjah.

headline.print_headline: Gunfire Celebration in Kabul After Dramatic Afghanistan Win
headline.main: Gunfire Celebration in Kabul After Dramatic Afghanistan Win
